description: Our mission is to share the story of Florence Nightingale, the founder of modern nursing and the lady with the lamp. Our small but mighty exhibit allows for people to learn and engage with one of the most recognizable national heroes of the Victorian Era. There is fun for all ages with interactive family trails and guided highlights tours throughout the day.

factsheet.heading: About Us
paragraphs: The Florence Nightingale Museum celebrates the life and work of the best known figure in nursing history. Visit the museum to celebrate the life of this trailblazing woman; discover all about her affluent childhood, how she fought against her parentsâ€™ wishes to become a nurse, her work during the Crimean War and how she campaigned for better healthcare for ordinary people. See the actual lamp she carried which earned her the nickname The Lady With The Lamp, meet her pet owl, and see her medicine chest. Make sure to attend one of our guided highlights tours throughout the day.

location.address: Florence Nightingale Museum, 2 Lambeth Palace Rd, SE1 7EP

name: Florence Nightingale Museum
